title: IL2 Sturmovik - Forgotten Battles [Flying game for PC]
description:
Requires:-
2000/XP/Vista.
1.4GB harddrive space.
256 RAM.

Copied CD-ROM.
UBISOFT
Delivered in rar folder.

Use 7Zip to extract the game from the rar folder.
Get 7Zip from the link below.  <a href="
http://www.filehippo.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehippo.com/</a>

Once 7Zip has installed, simply right click the rar folder and choose EXTRACT HERE, then double click Setup.

IL2 Sturmovik:Forgotton Battles.
Choose from 89 different fighter and bomber aircrafts.

Play on-line against up to 32 players through UBi.com

Quick briefing.
Press i key to start engine, b key to take brakes off, + and - key to throttle up engine, then use the arrow keys to control the joy stick
